org.elasticsearch.index.snapshots.blobstore

Class BlobStoreIndexShardSnapshots

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.snapshots.blobstore.BlobStoreIndexShardSnapshots
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<BlobStoreIndexShardSnapshot>

    public class BlobStoreIndexShardSnapshots
extends Object
implements Iterable<BlobStoreIndexShardSnapshot>
    Contains information about all snapshot for the given shard in repository

    This class is used to find files that were already snapshoted and clear out files that no longer referenced by any snapshots
